articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Amazon is generating lots of free-cash flow, time to get on board -Barron's
articles.description: Amazon.com Inc is generating lots of free cash flow, which it often uses to invest in growing its business, making the e-commerce retailer a good investment, weekly newspaper Barron's said on Jan. 3.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (Reuters) - Amazon.com Inc (AMZN.O) is generating lots of free cash flow, which it often uses to invest in growing its business, making the e-commerce retailer a good investment, weekly newspaper Barron’s said on Jan. 3. 
The company’s shares closed… [+743 chars]

articles.title: Trump promises possibly 'disproportionate' response to any Iran attack
articles.description: The United States will quickly strike back, "perhaps in a disproportionate manner," if Iran strikes any American person or target, U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The United States will quickly strike back, “perhaps in a disproportionate manner,” if Iran strikes any American person or target, U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: South Africa's Eskom to end power cuts late on Sunday
articles.description: South Africa's struggling state utility Eskom said on Sunday it would end power cuts at 11 p.m. local time (2100 GMT) and that it did not expect to implement power cuts on Monday.'
articles.content:
JOHANNESBURG (Reuters) - South Africa’s struggling state utility Eskom said on Sunday it would end power cuts at 11 p.m. local time (2100 GMT) and that it did not expect to implement power cuts on Monday. 
Eskom had planned to cut up to 2,000 megawatts (MW) … [+1516 chars]

articles.title: Six rockets fall in Baghdad: Iraqi military
articles.description: Iraq's military said in a statement on Sunday that six Katyusha rockets had fallen in Baghdad; three inside the heavily fortified Green Zone and three others in the nearby Jadriya area.
articles.content:
BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Iraq’s military said in a statement on Sunday that six Katyusha rockets had fallen in Baghdad; three inside the heavily fortified Green Zone and three others in the nearby Jadriya area. 
Reporting by Ahmed Aboulenein; Editing by Maha El D… [+3 chars]

articles.title: Turkey's Erdogan says interest rates and inflation will fall to single digits in 2020
articles.description: Turkey's President Tayyip Erdogan said on Sunday that interest rates and inflation would come down to single digits this year,'
articles.content:
ISTANBUL (Reuters) - Turkey’s President Tayyip Erdogan said on Sunday that interest rates and inflation would come down to single digits this year, 
Erdogan made the comment in an interview with CNN Turk television.

articles.title: Iraq militia leader says if U.S. troops stay they will be occupiers

articles.title: U.S. service member, contractors killed in militant attack in Kenya
articles.description: One U.S. military service member and two contractors were killed on Sunday during an attack by Somalia's al Shabaab militant group on a military base in Kenya, the U.S. military said in a statement.

articles.content:

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Netanyahu stumbles, calls Israel a 'nuclear power'
articles.description: In an apparent slip of the tongue on Sunday, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu described Israel as a nuclear power before correcting himself with a nod and a smile. Lisa Bernhard has more.
articles.content:
Posted 
In an apparent slip of the tongue on Sunday, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu described Israel as a nuclear power before correcting himself with a nod and a smile. Lisa Bernhard has more.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Blast heard in Iraqi capital Baghdad, cause unknown - reuters witnesses
articles.description: Two loud blasts were heard in Baghdad on Sunday night, Reuters witnesses said. It was not immediately possible to confirm the causes or locations.
articles.content:
BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Two loud blasts were heard in Baghdad on Sunday night, Reuters witnesses said. It was not immediately possible to confirm the causes or locations. 
Reporting by Ahmed Aboulenein; Editing by Maha El Dahan
